Package io.jans.casa.ui.vm.user

Class UserPreferenceViewModel

java.lang.Object
io.jans.casa.ui.vm.user.UserViewModel
io.jans.casa.ui.vm.user.UserPreferenceViewModel
public class UserPreferenceViewModel extends UserViewModel
This is the ViewModel of page fragment preferred.zul (and the fragments included by it). It controls the functionality for setting the user's preferred authentication method when second factor authentication is enabled
